The Boeing 757 is a narrow-body, dual engine plane. This family was intended to be the replacement for the Boeing 727.

In-Game

The 757-200 is the most popular, with the -200ER and -300 variants having some models in circulation.

Specs

Boeing 757 Specifications (Real Life)
757-200/-200ER 757-300
Length 47.3 m (155 ft 3 in) 54.4 m (178 ft 7 in)
Wingspan 38.0 m (124 ft 10 in)
Height 13.6 m (44 ft 6 in
Engine Rolls-Royce RB211-535E4(B), Pratt & Whitney PW2000-37/40/43

Trivia

  • The majority of orders in this family come from the 757-200.
  • The 757-200ER is not a new plane, but is the -200 with special permits that allows it to go farther (ETOPS).

  • Boeing 757 on Wikipedia
